Speaker: A
Text: Are you sure the server was backed up before the update last night?

Speaker: B
Text: I thought it was, but now I’m not seeing yesterday’s logs.

Speaker: A
Text: That’s worrying. Did the update overwrite the config files?

Speaker: B
Text: It might have. I didn’t realize the script was pointing to the old directory.

Speaker: A
Text: Okay, let’s slow down and retrace what ran and in what order.

Speaker: B
Text: Good idea. I’ll pull the deployment history and check the timestamps.

Speaker: A
Text: If the logs are gone, do we have anything in the cloud archive?

Speaker: B
Text: Possibly, but it only snapshots once every 24 hours.

Speaker: A
Text: That might still save us if the timing lines up.

Speaker: B
Text: Fingers crossed—otherwise we’re rebuilding from scratch.
